PointHighlighterConfigurable
public abstract class APointHighlighter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPointHighlighter<APointHighlighter>

Adapter class that implements optional methods of IPointPainter as "no operation".

3.0.0

isConsumedByPaint

public boolean isConsumedByPaint()
Description copied from interface: IPointHighlighter
If this returns true the Chart2D will remove this point highlighter from the ITracePoint2D after it was used the first and only time to paint that point.

This behavior may be used e.g. for point - highlighting based upon mouse events: The mouse events highlight the point but those mouse event listeners do not know the previous highlighted point to remove the highlighting.

Specified by:
isConsumedByPaint in interface IPointHighlighter<APointHighlighter>
Returns:
true if this highlighter should be removed after the first painting of the point it is assigned to. TODO: rename this method to isExclusive.
See Also:
IPointHighlighter.isConsumedByPaint()
